entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 13 April 2023
